name: @credit/jstc-vscode
description: Javascript with Typescript Comments (JSTC) support for VSCode

scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm install && npm run build && npm prune --production

author: Duane Johnson <duane.johnson@gmail.com>

untrustedWorkspaces.description: The extension requires workspace trust because it executes code specified by the workspace. Loading the user's node_modules and loading config files is disabled when untrusted

jstc.enable-ts-plugin.title: Enable TypeScript JSTC plugin
jstc.enable-ts-plugin.description: Enables a TypeScript plugin which enalbes typescript comments in javascript

jstc.ask-to-enable-ts-plugin.title: Ask to enable TypeScript JSTC plugin
jstc.ask-to-enable-ts-plugin.description: Ask on startup to enable the TypeScript plugin.
